Package com.peterphi.std.guice.web.rest.auth.oauth2.rest.api

Interface OAuth2ClientCallbackRestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OAuth2ClientCallbackRestServiceImpl
@Path("/oauth2/client") public interface OAuth2ClientCallbackRestService

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ERROR_ACCESS_DENIED
    The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.
    static final String
    ERROR_INVALID_REQUEST
    The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed.
    static final String
    ERROR_INVALID_SCOPE
    The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.
    static final String
    ERROR_SERVER_ERROR
    The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
    static final String
    ERROR_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE
    The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
    static final String
    ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED_CLIENT
    The client is not authorized to request an authorization code using this method.
    static final String
    ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_RESPONSE_TYPE
    The authorization server does not support obtaining an authorization code using this method.

      • Constant Field Values

    • ERROR_SERVER_ERROR

      static final String ERROR_SERVER_ERROR
      The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. (This error code is needed because a 500 Internal Server Error HTTP status code cannot be returned to the client via an HTTP redirect.)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • ERROR_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE

      static final String ERROR_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE
      The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server. (This error code is needed because a 503 Service Unavailable HTTP status code cannot be returned to the client via an HTTP redirect.)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • callback

      @GET @Path("/cb") @Consumes("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") javax.ws.rs.core.Response callback(@QueryParam("code") String code, @QueryParam("state") String returnTo, @QueryParam("error") String error, @QueryParam("error_description") String errorDescription, @QueryParam("error_uri") String errorUri)
